note.p: Death: His residence, Rose Hill, Forest Hill (24 July 1876)
Education: Eton; Royal Military College, Addiscombe

Career: Cadet, Royal Artillery (Bengal) and went to India (1832); resigned (1841); began the 'Calcutta Review' (1841); returned to England (1845); entered home civil service, HEIC (1856); Secretary in the Office of the Secretary of State for India (by 1865)
